Hello

Melhor jogo de quebra-cabeça que já joguei, puzzles bem legais e inteligentes, é um jogo um tanto satisfatório de jogar, a mecânica de portais é muito boa e te faz imaginar uma na vida real (o que além de legal poderia ser bem catastrófico), é bem leve, rodou muito bem no meu pc, não recomendo, eu digo que jogue antes de morrer porque vale muito a pena.

Сюжет в игре относительный, весь акцент идет на механику геймплея.
Если ищите игру которая заставит вас думать, но при этом не хотите сильно напрягаться, то эта игра для вас.

Игру советую

I've spent a lot of hours playing this game over and over again, trying to get achievements and such. I can confidently say that even after playing through it so many times that it really never gets old. It's a quick game to play through (I believe it took me two hours the first time I played it) and has some great replay value. You don't even need the challenge of not knowing the puzzles anymore. Even after the solutions are memorized, it's just so fun flying around through the portals that it's worth screwing around in again and again. Definitely worth the money! Buy it!
Really well done and fun! If you have a few hours to kill to do puzzles and such, then this is for you.

Imagine GLaDOS as a gps: 

"Turn right here,
TURN RIGHT HERE,
 Oh,You already turned right,
I thought I said turn left,
 You monster,
 Great you missed the turn It's not like I gave you an advanced warning or anything,
  Oh wait I did 3 of them  
   Now I have to recalculate the entire route  
  All by myself     
 All because of you we're in this situation now,
I can't believe I told you to go left,
And you know what you did?
You turned right.
You lunatic.
Why are you even driving?  
TURN LEFT,
This isn't a test, how are you even failing at this?
Turn left, Hope you can understand.
You should go faster.
You know, press the accelarate harder.
No, not this much!
How can you fail such a simple task like that?
And you didn't even turn right.
I have an idea that will be best for one of us.
[GLaDOS deleted successfully]
...
...
Just joking, you wouldn't make it 1 meter without me.

Grande classico, ottimi rompicapi con una curva della difficoltà molto ben pensata:  story mode per tutti, alcune sezioni richiedono un po' di ragionamento ma senza diventare mai frustrante mentre per i rompicapi veramente tosti ci sono le camere avanzate e le sfide. Per prendere l'oro nelle sfide c'è da sudare e non poco. 
In ogni caso consigliatissimo, la story mode è geniale (Cubo da compagnia <3)
